translation.en: All right.

translation.en: I don't know.

translation.en: Yeah, maybe.

translation.en: But this never felt right.

translation.en: I'm not going back to the way things were before.

translation.en: As a gardener at the house.

translation.en: No. It's strictly against our policy for family members to work together.

translation.en: Our patients are elderly, infirm.

translation.en: No, she absolutely understood the importance of her job, especially...

translation.en: Well, you wouldn't have known it to look at him, but his health was very delicate.
translation.vi: Thì, chỉ nhìn thì sẽ không biết, nhưng sức khỏe ông ấy rất nhạy cảm.

translation.en: You know, Katie told me, she kept a notebook,

translation.en: like, a daily log, just to keep track of his medication.
translation.vi: như nhật ký, để theo dõi thuốc của ông ấy.

translation.en: Do you happen to have a record of his medications?

translation.en: You'd have to speak with his doctor about that.

translation.en: Right. How about Ms. Franklin's contract, how much she was being paid?

translation.en: Yeah, sure, we can get that to you.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Excellent. Thank you. And let me...

translation.vi: hỏi anh. Cô ấy có...

translation.en: Good lord.

translation.en: Shit!

translation.en: So he's been up there for a while.

translation.en: Wow.

translation.vi: Katie, mở cửa ra đi!

translation.en: Hey.

translation.en: I don't know.

translation.en: is the last place that anybody's gonna come looking for him.

translation.vi: Không ai biết về nơi này và hắn có thể ẩn náu ở đây

translation.en: Although, I'm sure that getting shot and dying out there

translation.en: We'll explain it to them.

translation.en: We don't need this house, Adam!

translation.vi: ta sẽ ổn thôi.

translation.en: All right?

translation.en: I'm done with all right.

translation.en: That's not enough anymore.

translation.en: I told you. I'm not going back to the way things were before.

translation.en: Pretend it never happened?

translation.en: I'll take care of it.

translation.en: belongs to us now.

translation.en: Okay, this is our future.

translation.en: I'm not gonna let anybody take that away from us.

translation.en: Look, everything is gonna be okay.

translation.en: I'll take care of this for you.

translation.en: What are you doing?

translation.en: Someone's in the house.

translation.en: Where did you get that?

translation.en: We need to call 911.

translation.en: Freeze, asshole!

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.vi: Ôi, Chúa ơi.

translation.en: How are you holding up, Katie?

translation.en: Detective Chesler.

translation.en: Hell of a thing.

translation.en: It was an accident.

translation.en: Yeah, that's what they're saying.

translation.en: Either way, law says it's self- defense, so...

translation.en: It still makes you wonder.
translation.vi: Nó vẫn khiến ta băn khoăn.

translation.en: What was going through his head?
translation.vi: Lúc đó, ông ấy nghĩ gì?

translation.en: Why would he do something like that?
translation.vi: Sao ông ấy lại làm chuyện đó?

translation.en: Just let himself into the house?

translation.en: I don't know.

translation.en: Something had to set him off.

translation.en: I know none of this is you, Katie.
translation.vi: Tôi biết cô không dính líu, Katie.

translation.en: What?
translation.vi: Sao cơ?

translation.en: Everything was fine around here until Adam started work.

translation.en: So you can tell me whatever is going on.

translation.en: You don't understand.

translation.en: maybe it was a gift, who's to say?

translation.en: But I want you to put yourself in my shoes.

translation.en: The big picture.
